DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if patients are able to reliably screen themselves for nutrition risk.
DOC.brief_title: Simplified Nutritional Screening for Patient Use
DOC.criteria: Male or female Adults aged > 18years Able to complete screening and provide written informed consent Willingness to take part Children (<18years) Pregnant women Inpatients Unable to complete screen due to physical or mental incapacity Unable to comprehend oral and written English language Participation in other nutrition studies
